body: This is the best NTR that has ever been made period.
ı cant belive this still hasnt been translated
Shit! I think I've reached the point where NTR doesn't make me rage anymore, noooo! helppppp!
Well, this shit finally end, no comment, simply.... FUCK, FUCK, FUUUUUUUUUUUUCK DAAAAAAAAAAAAAANM!! THOSE 2......
@DeathPrince sorry, but the sounds are of the heart (ドクン, dokun,  "a hard heart beat"), so, the guy just was prepared himself for what was coming (you know).

This was one of the worst ntr I have ever read... it made me cry... 

What kind of fucken ntr makes you cry instead of wanting fap... shit man, this hit me where it wasn't supposed to hit. I can only feel pity for him... Atleast use a fucken real-like dick and fuck the shit out of her or something!
This was one of rhea worst ntr

We need a chapter 28, where the fucking husband got gang-raped and then had his balls cut off.  He deserved the worst end he can get for breaking a good woman just to satisfy his perversion.  Damn it all.  I know this is ero manga but I can only find rage and sadness in reading this.  FUCK THIS piece of shit manga!

I see a mans shoe next to hers in the last picture. I'm not sure if those are sex or cooking sounds, but i assume it is sex and she is back to her old self. In the end he didn't change and neither did she. She will still cuck him since it is what he likes. Only difference is now their bond is repaired so they are both set in their roles. She cuck him and he get off to it. The end.

I think no other ntr made my blood boil like this one, to see a man willingly share his love and fucking take pleasure in it...  It shouldn't be possible. Thing is, this really happens, makes me wonder if maybe monogamy was a failed concept from the start...
fuck this shit ;u;. grill deserved a better man :V
From the look of the last picture, it seems like he is still a cuck as you see a male shoes in the front door.
